alert.note: Alert for Houston; Madison; Montgomery; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 28 at 7:10PM CDT until April 28 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN TRINITY...NORTHWESTERN MONTGOMERY...WESTERN SAN JACINTO...SOUTHERN HOUSTON...SOUTHEASTERN MADISON AND WALKER COUNTIES... At 708 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 11 miles west of Riverside to 7 miles east of Huntsville to near New Waverly, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Huntsville, Trinity, New Waverly, Coldspring, Point Blank, Riverside, Huntsville State Park, Crabbs Prairie, Oakhurst and Evergreen. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Houston; Madison; Montgomery; San Jacinto; Trinity; Walker
